bioconda.name: bioconductor-keggrest
bioconda.summary: Client-side REST access to the Kyoto Encyclopedia of Genes and Genomes (KEGG)

biotools.summary: A package that provides a client interface to the KEGG REST server. Based on KEGGSOAP by J. Zhang, R. Gentleman, and Marc Carlson, and KEGG (python package) by Aurelien Mazurie.

bioschemas.name: KEGGREST
bioschemas.summary: A package that provides a client interface to the KEGG REST server. Based on KEGGSOAP by J. Zhang, R. Gentleman, and Marc Carlson, and KEGG (python package) by Aurelien Mazurie.
